name: Ascension (itch) (TriBrain, Tomás Bruckner Kambo)
description:
Help the Ghost to make a "new start" by ascending to Heaven. The player must dodge and/or destroy the blocks to ascend to Paradise. Game made for Venezuela Duel Jam 2016.

Credits:
Tomás Bruckner. (Programming and Game Design).
Matias Bruckner. (Arts and Game Design)
Clementina Villarroel. (UI Artist).

Made with Phaser.js, Photoshop and Illustrator.
Music and SFX done with http://www.bfxr.net/ and www.soundation.com.
